instruction: Organize the given facts into a concise summary.
input: Stephen Hawking was a British scientist, who was born in Oxford in 1942. He was an expert in cosmology and theoretical physics, and his most popular book was A Brief History of Time. Hawking was also known for his pioneering research on black holes and quantum mechanics.
output: Stephen Hawking (1942-2018) was a British scientist and expert in cosmology and theoretical physics, best known for writing the book A Brief History of Time, and his pioneering research on black holes and quantum mechanics. He was born in Oxford in 1942.
